snippet.title: Ear Cat - Fun music game for ear training
snippet.description:
For iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ear-cat-lite/id1377248394?ls=1&mt=8

For Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.melodycats.earcatlite

Ear Cat is a fun game created to develop your musical ear, with levels that get progressively more challenging. 

An intuitive approach to recognising intervals, improving your solfege and recognizing pitches in relation to a tonal center. It is also designed to enhance your musical memory with exercises based on classic melodies. Helpful and entertaining - for beginners and skilled musicians alike, and developed in collaboration with professional musicians and educators. Ear Cat completes the popular Melody Cats series (Rhythm Cat, Treble Cat, Bass Cat). Like music? Like cats? You'll love this game.
